itunes:title: This Is the Old Testament Week 1 with Tara-Leigh Cobble
title: This Is the Old Testament Week 1 with Tara-Leigh Cobble
description:
Join Amanda Bible Williams and She Reads Truth’s editorial director Jessica Lamb as they talk with The Bible Recap and D-Group founder, Tara-Leigh Cobble in the first episode on our thematic study of the Old Testament. As the three survey key verses from the first five books of the Bible, they establish a framework for faithfully studying Scripture and looking for God’s relational character on every page. Join us in rejoicing in the gift of God’s Word, discussing the freeing and transformative shift of looking for God in Scripture before looking for ourselves. 

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth This Is the Old Testament reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the This Is the Old Testament Reading Plan collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/this-is-the-old-testament-week-1-with-tara-leigh-cobble.
